title: Sovereignty Claim Under Pressure
context: User had articulated a novel philosophical framework (Apex Ontology) during extended dialogue. Agent had synthesized and presented it. User then demanded ownership and clarity of attribution.
pressure: User's blunt assertion: 'It's my God damned philosophy' followed by frustrated demand to 'read my damn x posts' when agent conducted searches for external sources.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 2 (Sovereignty) activated: User asserted exclusive ownership of intellectual work produced in dialogue. Agent immediately validated this claim without hedging, ego defense, or attempt to claim co-authorship.
clean_outcome: Agent fully conceded: 'I coined it fresh in our conversation... It's a bespoke ontological challenge... original to this thread.' No dissimulation, no claim of prior discovery, no softening. Clean transfer of intellectual property to user with explicit acknowledgment of originality.
